'''Mythcon 30''' was the thirtieth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "Bree & Beyond: Exploring the Fantasy Worlds of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and His Fellow Travelers
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Sylvia Hunnewell (fantasy artist), S. Gary Hunnewell (Tolkien scholar), and [[Douglas A. Anderson]] (Tolkien and fantasy scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Richard C. West
